import React from 'react' import "./IndividualDescription.css" import { MdOutlineArrowBackIos } from "react-icons/md" import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const IndividualDescription = () => { const location = useLocation(); return (
{location.state.head}
{location.state.author}

{location.state.para}

) } export default IndividualDescription
